com.fasterxml.clustermate.service.msg

Class StreamingResponseContentImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fasterxml.clustermate.service.msg.StreamingResponseContentImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    StreamingResponseContent

    public class StreamingResponseContentImpl
extends Object
implements StreamingResponseContent
    Simple (but not naive) StreamingResponseContent implementation used for returning content for inlined entries.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected static com.fasterxml.storemate.shared.util.BufferRecycler _bufferRecycler
      We can reuse read buffers as they are somewhat costly to allocate, reallocate all the time.

      • getLength

        public long getLength()
        Description copied from interface: StreamingResponseContent
        Method that may be called to check length of the content to stream, if known. If length is not known, -1 will be returned; otherwise non-negative length.
